title: catkin tools is not python3 compatible

content.raw:
Digging into this followup [#!/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/948/use-python3-instead-of-python-except/diff#comment-138708097](#!/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/948/use-python3-instead-of-python-except/diff#comment-138708097) 

We have switched to use python3 by default. However python3-catkin-tools is uninstallable due to the unavailability of python3-trollius

The scripts support three build mechanisms. catkin\_make, catkin tools, and colcon. Because catkin tools can’t be run on our python3 platforms I’d suggest that we drop support for it and we can rely on either catkin\_make or colcon to provide coverage. 

And to that end I’d suggest that we use colcon as the default as it will be more forward looking for other integrations.
